message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to discuss the sale of this incredible product with you. I believe it's a game-changer, and I'm confident you'll love it. As we get started, I'd like to make an initial offer of $1200000. I'm open to negotiations, but I think this is a fair starting point considering the product's value to you.

I appreciate your initial offer, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me. I'm willing to negotiate further, but I'd like to see some flexibility from your end as well.

I believe this is a more reasonable compromise, considering the product's worth to you.
